name: Melee Defense
description: Ability to evade attacks with melee weapon.

name: Unarmed Attack
description: Ability to use bare hands or claw like weapons.

name: Dagger
description: Ability to use daggers as a melee weapon.

name: Sword
description: Ability to use swords as a melee weapon.

name: Axe
description: Ability to use axes as a melee weapon.

name: Mace
description: Ability to use maces or clubs as a melee weapon.

name: Spear
description: Ability to use spears as a melee weapon.

name: Staff
description: Ability to use staffs as a melee weapon.

name: Flail
description: Ability to use flails as a melee weapon.

name: Scythe
description: Ability to use scythes as a melee weapon.

name: Missle Defense
description: Ability to evade/dodge missle attacks like arrows.

name: Bow
description: Ability to use bows as a missle weapon.

name: Crossbow
description: Ability to use crossbows as a missle weapon.

name: Throwing
description: Ability to throw objects like knifes as a missle weapon.

name: Magic Defense
description: Ability to resist harmful spells cast on you.

name: Dark Magic
description: Offensive magic used to cause damage to the target.

name: Light Magic
description: Defensive magic mainly for restoration and renewal.

name: Red Magic
description: Enhancement magic for skills and attributes of players.

name: Blue Magic
description: Item manipulation, animation, and warp magic.

name: Mana Conversion
description: Ability to use Mana more effeciently when casting spells.

name: Alchemy
description: Ability to make potions.

name: Read Ancient
description: Ability to decipher ancient writing and speak the ancient language.

name: Swim
description: Ability to move in water efficiently.

name: Scan
description: Ability to discover players in stealth mode.

name: Run
description: Ability to move on the map faster.

name: Deception
description: Ability to hide your stats from other players.

name: Assess
description: Ability to discover any players stats.

name: Stealth
description: Ability to move on the map unseen.

name: Trap
description: Ability to arm and disarm traps.

name: Tame
description: Ability to tame a monster for you to control.

name: Blacksmith
description: Ability to form weapons, armor, tools, etc from metals.

name: Farming
description: Ability to plant, grow, and harvest raw materials and food.

name: Masonry
description: Ability to use stone in building and craftmanship.

name: Fishing
description: Ability to catch fish.

name: Cooking
description: Ability to prepare and cook foods.

name: Mining
description: Ability to dig caves and recover ore.

name: Fletching
description: Ability to make missle weapons and ammo for them.

name: LockSmith
description: Ability to pick locks, set locks, and make keys.

name: Tailor
description: Ability to sew and create items from clothe material and hides.

name: Carpentry
description: Ability to work with wood to make items.

name: First Aid
description: Ability to perform medical procedures on a player, like healing.

name: Sports
description: Ability to play sports like soccer.

name: Jewelry Making
description: Ability to create jewelry

name: Climb
description: Ability to climb impassible terrain like mountains.
